description: An inflated alligator floats above the water near a riverbank, its limbs splayed out in the air. Two hippopotamuses stand on the bank; one has its mouth wide open with its tongue hanging out, appearing shocked or distressed, while the other looks on with wide eyes. The bizarre inflation of the alligator presents an absurd and surreal situation. One hippo appears to be yelling a name in reaction to the event. The scene depicts an unexpected and perhaps dangerous transformation in a seemingly natural environment.
caption: "AAAAAAAAAAAAlbert!"
